# delegate

**Instance Property**

The delegate for all text views sharing the receiver’s layout manager.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any NSTextViewDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Managing the text view’s content

- **NSTextViewDelegate**: A set of optional methods that text view delegates can use to manage selection, set text attributes, work with the spell checker, and more.
